title: Brighton 2-0 Tottenham - Premier League 2019/20: Live score and updates
text:
Brighton host Tottenham at the Amex Stadium in Saturday's early Premier League action.

Spurs will be looking to put their 7-2 European defeat at home to Bayern Munich behind them as they look to repeat last season's domestic performance against the Seagulls which saw them win both games.

Graham Potter's men will be hoping they can take advantage of Spurs low morale as he looks to guide Brighton to their second win of the season having not won since the opener away to Watford.

Sportsmail's NATHAN SALT will provide live coverage of Brighton vs Tottenham including score, lineups and build-up.
description: Tottenham will be looking to avenge for their midweek dressing down by Bayern Munich while Brighton will look to capitalise on low morale at Spurs. Sportsmail will bring you the updates.
